channel.title: RA News
channel.description: Resident Advisor's news feed - providing the latest electronic music updates.
channel.copyright: Copyright Resident Advisor Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Gatekeeper's Aaron David Ross announces his first solo album in five years, Filter Failure
item.description: It's an audiovisual work with 10 animated videos, one of which is out now.

item.title: Flying Lotus releases Yasuke soundtrack on Warp Records
item.description: Out now, the album features guest appearances by Thundercat and Denzel Curry.

item.title: South Asian labels launch charity initiatives for India
item.description: AsymetriK and Discostan are raising funds for NGOs providing Covid-relief in India.

item.title: DJ Koze-produced rapper Marteria releases new track, Paradise Delay
item.description: Watch the video below.

item.title: London's Southport Weekender renamed Beautiful People Festival
item.description: Everything else about this year's event—date, venue, lineup—remains the same

item.title: Primavera Sound may happen over two weekends in 2022
item.description: The Barcelona festival is doubling its usual length, according to Reuters.

item.title: Night Time Industries Association Scotland sues government over Covid-19 restrictions
item.description: "There is no alternative," says Mike Grieve, managing director of Sub Club.

item.title: FABRICLIVE announces first shows of 2021
item.description: Pariah, Ikonika, D Double E and Scratchclart will all play the club in July.

item.title: Mix Of The Day: Gore-txt
item.description: Slick, melodic and celestial techno from the Omaha DJ.

item.title: Burial and Blackdown release new split EP, Shock Power Of Love, on Keysound
item.description: The 12-inch features two tracks from each artist, including a Blackdown remix of Heatmap.

item.title: Chengdu club .TAG celebrates seven years with a five-city tour
item.description: Residents and local DJs will play Shenzhen, Hangzhou, Shanghai, Beijing and Hong Kong.

item.title: Jim O'Rourke releases new album on DDS, Too Compliment
item.description: Recorded at his storied Steamroom studio, the LP is out on Demdike Stare's label now.

item.title: Arthur Russell covered by Peter Broderick, Laetitia Sadler and more in new 7-inch series
item.description: It's part of a new vinyl and digital series by Unheard of Hope.

item.title: Rare Effect, a ten-day music and NFT festival, takes place in Lisbon this May
item.description: Arroz Estudios will host live music performances, VR art, an NFT exhibition and more.

item.title: No Bounds Festival announces 2021 lineup
item.description: SHERELLE, Helena Hauff and Andy Stott are among the bookings.

item.title: Spiritland launches weekly club night at London's Royal Festival Hall
item.description: The party starts on Friday July 9th.

item.title: KG debuts on Black Acre with 'Koko'
item.description: Karen Nyame's new single features Mista Silva.

item.title: SW. returns to Avenue 66 for a new mini-album, blewLIPs
item.description: It's a follow-up to his 2020 LP, TRUElipS.

item.title: dBridge and Prequel Tapes release debut collaboration on Midnight Shift
item.description: Ionize is out June 18th.

item.title: Mix Of The Day: Ivy Barkakati
item.description: The Barcelona-based DJ gets the party started.
